graphics module¶

data_fetcher.graphics.accumulate_data(data, station, contaminant, frequency)¶

Accumulates data for a given station and contaminant :type data: :param data: pd.DataFrame, data to be accumulated :type station: :param station: str, station name :type contaminant: :param contaminant: str, contaminant name :type frequency: :param frequency: str, frequency for resampling :return: pd.DataFrame, resampled data

data_fetcher.graphics.plot_timeseries(data, title, ylabel, xlabel='Date', figsize=(10, 6))¶

Plots a timeseries :type data: :param data: pd.DataFrame, timeseries data :type title: :param title: str, title of the plot :type ylabel: :param ylabel: str, label for the y-axis :type xlabel: :param xlabel: str, label for the x-axis :type figsize: :param figsize: tuple, size of the figure

AVDM_pollutants
